Paregraphs.Text: The Institute provides excellent hostel facility for the students. Hostels are provided with round the clock caretakers and other essential staff. Honorable Secretary of the institute & Chairman of hostel Advisory committee monitors overall organization of hostels & provides guidelines time to time. With personal attention and supervision, a clean, healthy and cheerful atmosphere is maintained at the hostels.
